channel.title: Walking, updating players direction
channel.description:
Does anyone know what method handles the change of direction of a player per tile?
Not sure the question was understandable, but the player will find the route to the desired location, and the player will update direction accordingly. This is the method I'm after.
Any guidance is appreciated.

item.title: Walking, updating players direction
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I don’t think so

Read full topic

item.title: Walking, updating players direction
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

does this help at all?

[code]public void walkTo(int i, int j) {
if (EntangleDelay > 0)
return;
newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
if (++newWalkCmdSteps > 50)
newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
int k = absX + i;
k -= mapRegionX * 8;
newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
int l = absY + j;
l -= mapRegionY * 8;
newWalkCmdIsRunning = ((inStream.readSignedByteC() == 1) && playerEnergy > 0);
for (this.i = 0; this.i < newWalkCmdSteps; this.i++) {
newWalkCmdX[this.i] += k;
newWalkCmdY[this.i] += l;
}

	poimiY = l;
	poimiX = k;
}

[/code]

Read full topic
